prompt:
Aetheric Elemental gender Hero
Element: Aetheric Essence
Title: Aetheric elemental gender warrior, conduit of celestial might
Lens: 80mm
Style: Photorealistic
Features: Body shimmering with ethereal quintessential aether, an aura of cosmic power surrounds him.
Attire: Astral cyber-armor designed to channel and focus aetheric quintessential forces.
Pose: frontal medium-shot portrait.
Background: Standing defiantly against a backdrop of cosmic threats, aetheric essence serves as a bulwark protecting all of existence.

Aurora Elemental gender Hero
Element: Aurora
Title: Futuristic dystopian aurora elemental gender warrior, utopian superhero
Lens: 80mm
Style: Photorealistic
Features: Skin shimmering with the ethereal glow of the aurora borealis, eyes that flicker with curtain-like auroral displays.
Attire: Luminescent armor that channels geomagnetic solar winds.
Pose: frontal medium-shot portrait.
Background: The polar night sky, alive with a dance of lights, figure framed against the majesty of natural light shows.

Background: A once barren landscape, now blossoming with verdant life, as flora and fauna thrive under bioplasmic stewardship.
